title: Create file-operations patterns (3)
description: Create three file operation patterns: create-file.pattern.md, modify-file.pattern.md, and bulk-rename.pattern.md. Each follows the standard pattern format with metadata, triggers, parameters, templates, and anti-patterns.
notes: Created 3 file-operations patterns: create-file.pattern.md (file creation with headers), modify-file.pattern.md (safe editing with Read-first requirement), bulk-rename.pattern.md (systematic renaming with dry-run).
